faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Answers to the questions we hear most from customers.

shipping.question: When will my order arrive?
shipping.answer: Most orders ship within 24 hours and arrive within 2-5 business days. You can see real-time updates inside the orders dashboard.

returns.question: How do I start a return?
returns.answer: Submit a return request from the orders page, choose the items, and print the prepaid label. We'll confirm once the package is scanned.

account.question: Can I change my account email?
account.answer: Yes. Visit account security, verify your password, and you can update the email in just a few clicks.

payments.question: Why was my payment declined?
payments.answer: Payments can fail for expired cards or bank safety checks. Try another card or contact us so we can work with your bank.

cta.title: Need personalized assistance?
cta.description: Create a priority support ticket and we'll assemble the right specialist team for you.
